mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM, MEMBER_LIST.* FROM MEMBER_LIST) WHERE NUM BETWEEN (#{pageNum}-1)*#{size}+1 AND (#{pageNum})*#{size}
select count(*) from member_list where M_CONDITION = '재직'
select count(*) from member_list where M_CONDITION = '퇴사'
select count(*) from member_list where M_TYPE = '정규직'
select count(*) from member_list where M_TYPE = '계약직'
select count(*) from member_list where M_TYPE = '임시직'
select count(*) from member_list where M_TYPE = '파견직'
select count(*) from member_list where M_TYPE = '위촉직'
select count(*) from member_list where M_TYPE = '일용직'
